DOC.brief_summary: Glidescope and chest CT iminge for the placement of the Univent Tube Without Fiberoptic Bronchoscope Assistance
DOC.brief_title: Placement of the Univent Tube Without Fiberoptic Bronchoscope Assistance
DOC.detailed_description: Comparing the traditional method of Univent Tube intubation and Glidescope combined with chest CT iminge guide the precise localization of double lumen endotracheal tube
DOC.criteria: BMI less than 35 kg/m2 ASA classifications of IIII, Modified Mallampati classification 1 or 2 Under general anesthesia Age younger than 18 yr or older than 65 yr ASA class IV or V Abnormalities of the heart, brain, liver, lung, kidney and coagulation functions
